title: Ep226 Forensic Photography
description:
This week, the gals examine a couple of extraordinary cases involving technology that we sometimes take for granted. Topics include a pill bottle with an invisible clue, a solo sock, and the history of mugshots. Bust open a bottle of the Gals' Rosé, rethink your screen name, and tune in for Forensic Photography.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
